channel.title: USA on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in USA on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.6: Two Months in the USA
item.description: 19th August 2014 Hi, How are you? It’s been two months to the day since I moved to the US. Here life is good.

item.title: SVL 1.5: A weekend in Michigan
item.description: 11th August 2014 Dear family and friends, How are you? Two busy weekends have passed since I last wrote to you.

item.title: SVL 1.2: Two weeks in the USA
item.description: 2nd July 2014 Hello everyone, Today I took the drivers’ written test and passed with flying colours. I got all answers correct! I studied hard for the last couple of days although I was preparing using videos even sometime last week.

item.title: LOG 4.3: Another Publication and Plans
item.description: 13the February, 2014 Hello everyone, I’m happy to report my second paper was accepted for publication today. It will become available in another few weeks. Thesis work is progressing well overall.

item.title: The Amazon and us
item.description: First published on August 12, 2007 _“In the time it takes to sing this song, There’ll be four acres cleared in the Amazon. The jungle burns all through the night,
